author: By JOHN DANISZEWSKI Associated Press
title: Analysis: Virus shows benefit of learning from other nations
description: In 1910, when a contagious pneumonic plague was ravaging northeastern China, a physician there concluded that the disease traveled through the air. So he adapted something he had seen in England. He began instructing doctors, nurses, patients and members of…
